add.description: This is the label for the 'Add' buttons.

block_element.description: Label for 'Block Element' context menu item

clickhide_instructions.message: After closing this popup, click (or right-click) an element on the page.

description.message: The free adblock tool for Chrome: Blocks annoying video ads on YouTube, Facebook ads, banners and much more.

disabled_for_these_domains.message: Adblock Plus is disabled for the domains listed below. You can add a domain either via the Adblock Plus icon in the address bar or by typing the domain (not a URL) in the box and clicking the "Add domain" button.

enable_only_the.message: Enable only the filter lists you need. Too many can make Chrome unresponsive.

filter_must_follow_syntax.message: Your filter must follow the Adblock Plus filter syntax.

firstRun_acceptableAdsExplanation.description: This is the explanation of the acceptable ads feature
firstRun_acceptableAdsExplanation.message: Adblock Plus will always block annoying ads. Still, we want to encourage websites using plain and unobtrusive advertising. That's why we have established strict guidelines to identify acceptable ads, and allow these out of the box. You can always disable this if you want to block all ads.

firstRun_changelog.description: Page subtitle, links to the changelog

firstRun_dataCorruptionWarning.description: Help link for people with corrupted data that get the first-run page each time
firstRun_dataCorruptionWarning.message: Does this page keep showing up? Click here!

firstRun_feature_acceptableAds.description: One of the bullet points in the features list
firstRun_feature_acceptableAds.message: Support websites with acceptable ads (more below)

firstRun_feature_betterSurfing.description: One of the bullet points in the features list
firstRun_feature_betterSurfing.message: Enjoy the web without annoying ads

firstRun_feature_videoAds.description: One of the bullet points in the features list

firstRun_share1.message: Do you think Adblock Plus is worth sharing? Please do!

firstRun_share2.description: Alternative text to appear above Facebook/Twitter buttons
firstRun_share2.message: Adblock Plus is free and open source. Please support us:

firstRun_share2_or.description: 'or' as in 'donate or spread the word'

firstRun_title_install.description: This is the page heading on first installation

firstRun_title_update.description: This is the page heading on update

found_a_bug.message: Found a bug? Want to translate Adblock Plus into your language? Please file a request here.

last_updated_at.description: e.g. Last updated at 3:00pm on Apr 1, 2011

new_filters_added.message: New filters added; see Options to manage them.

remove_button.description: This is the label for the 'Remove selected' buttons.

subscriptionSelection_subscriptionSelect.message: Please choose a filter subscription from the list:
